childMarkdownRemark.html: I will ask you a series of questions pertaining to your health history and will assess your posture and identify weakness and will suggest ways improve your current condition.
This is a light to moderate approach, therefore, the focus is on relaxation, improving circulation and giving you a boost of energy. Swedish massage can also aid after injury.
If you suffer from Chronic pain, nerve compression or postural issues, this form of massage manipulates soft tissue involving muscular and the nervous system.

This is more therapeutic and will focus on your stiff muscle pain and joints. The approach is deeper and slower and will focus on locating those trigger points and contracture muscle areas. Over time, those areas become stagnant and through the help of deep tissue massage, we are able to release and improve blood flow.

Some injuries may occur due to a sport or in some sort of training. This approach focuses on pre and post events, both with different results. Sports Massage can also promote flexibility and help to prevent injury.
Your body will go through many changes so depending on what stage you are in (pre or post), pregnancy massage can help with reducing pain, improving circulation, reducing edema in the legs and feet.
